name: Teddy Treehouse
description:
This was made in about four days for Unreal's "Well that Escalated Quickly" game jam.  I usually work with a partner or team, so I spread myself thin with this one.  Everything was done by me during the game jam period with the exception of the sound effects (which are royalty free) and the background music (which I did compose, but for another project before the game jam).

There isn't really any story.  You're just a teddy bear stealing candy from other teddy bears, and the controls are explained on tutorial signs in the world, so you can just jump right in.
